item.title: Another Tabbed Interface
item.description: This is a rather belated post and is sort of a continuation of my last post about Aspect Oriented Programming. I’ve made yet another tabbed interface widgety thing (like the ‘tubes needs another one) that uses AOP to add additonal features. A tabbed interface widget provided a nice problem for me to experiment with AOP. You can see the results which allows tabs in a widget to be draggable and closeable too.
